divs: sighting detailswas resting on hood of vehicle looking up into sky while talking to two friends from school. sky was dark but crystal clear. observed 7 discs come from west sky at approx 9pm moving east very fast. they abruptly stopped directly above us. very high in clear star night. i immediately pointed them out to friends. one lay on hood of auto with me and observed them motionless when two moved rapidly to the north. and, one to the south leaving the others stationary. shortly the two returned to formation and approx 30seconds the other returned from the south to form the v formation again. this done they moved away at a great rate of speed,east, out of sight.yellow\orange in color.friends and i were amazed and couldn't believe sight. we wee 15\16 at time of sighting. 3 people.
Summary: observed V formation,very high, of 6 discs.
